composites.intro: Our modern composite repair systems are extremely versatile, adaptable and reliable. They have many impressive capabilities that make them an attractive alternative to traditional repair or replacement methods.

noDownTime.label: No Down Time
noDownTime.description: In most cases composites can be installed with no downtime or depressurisation and can be designed as a permanent repair, saving the platform a lot of money.

noHotWork.label: No Hot Work
noHotWork.description: In piping or infrastructure welding repairs, costs associated with hot work can be tremendous and generate their own numerous safety concerns. Composite repairs require no hot work whatsoever.

extensivelyTested.label: Extensively Tested
extensivelyTested.description: Our engineered composite systems are in compliance with to validated to the following industry standards:ASME PCC-2, ISO/TS 24817, DNV Type Approval.

corrosionResistent.label: Corrosion Resistent
corrosionResistent.description: The impermeability and high adhesion level of our 100% solids epoxy resin creates the containment barrier, arresting corrosion immediately.

pipingCompatibility.label: Compatible with all Piping
pipingCompatibility.description: Compatible with Aluminium, GRE, Carbon Steel, PVC, Cast Iron, Polyethylene, Concrete, Polypropylene, Copper, Stainless Steel, Fibreglass, Titanium and many other materials.

economical.label: Economical
economical.description: As a repair or reinforcement, composites can cost much less to install when compared to traditional welded sleeve or replacement methods.

fireAndBlast.intro: Ecosse Global are specialist suppliers of flexible Passive Fire Protection Systems to the oil, gas, petrochemical and refining industries worldwide. Our highly specialised sealing systems offer asset protection from Hydrocarbon, Cellulosic and Jet Fire scenarios

design.label: Design
design.description: Our design centre uses state of the art CAD software for bespoke sealing design solutions.

testing.label: Testing
testing.description: We have full access use of approved test houses complete with evaluation facilities to support your application.

manufacture.label: Manufacture
manufacture.description: We have a dedicated production team with a wealth of specialised product knowledge.

support.label: After Sales Support
support.description: Our specialist trained after-sales team are here to help with any questions you may have concerning your PFP installation.

flexible.label: Flexible
flexible.description: We can also cater for extreme movement between pipe and sleeve, unlike some competitors systems that remain fixed in position.

sealants.intro: Ecosse Global are suppliers of specialist sealants and coatings to the oil, gas, petrochemical and wind farm industries. Our highly specialised sealing systems offer excellent adhesion and long-term protection from corrosion.

deck.label: Deck Repair
deck.description: Easy to use, fire-retardant epoxy with a long pot life for large deck areas.

module.label: Module Roof Repair
module.description: Water tolerant, corrosion arresting epoxy that forms an impermeable seal.

tank.label: Large Tank Repairs
tank.description: Specially designed for tricky weld seams and applied by heated airless spray.

abrasian.label: Abrasion Resistant Coatings
abrasian.description: Full of Kevlar™ filaments, developed to withstand high impact loadings on offshore boat landings.

flexible.label: Nuclear Grade Coatings
flexible.description: Certified for use in ‘Service Level 1’ applications. Application friendly, so reduces man-rem exposure.
